title: Adversarial robustness of amortized Bayesian inference. (arXiv:2305.14984v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Bayesian inference usually requires running potentially costly inference procedures separately for every new observation. In contrast, the idea of amortized Bayesian inference is to initially invest computational cost in training an inference network on simulated data, which can subsequently be used to rapidly perform inference (i.e., to return estimates of posterior distributions) for new observations. This approach has been applied to many real-world models in the sciences and engineering, but it is unclear how robust the approach is to adversarial perturbations in the observed data. Here, we study the adversarial robustness of amortized Bayesian inference, focusing on simulation-based estimation of multi-dimensional posterior distributions. We show that almost unrecognizable, targeted perturbations of the observations can lead to drastic changes in the predicted posterior and highly unrealistic posterior predictive samples, across several benchmark tasks and a real-world example fro

translated_title: 计算代价与贝叶斯推断的对抗性稳健性
translated_abstract: 贝叶斯推断通常需要单独运行可能昂贵的推理过程以获取每个新观测结果。相比之下，摊余的贝叶斯推断思想是最初在模拟数据上投资计算成本，然后可以用于快速执行推断（即返回后验分布估计）以获取新观测的结果。虽然在科学和工程中已经将这种方法应用于许多现实世界的模型，但其对于观测数据的对抗性扰动的稳健性尚不清楚。在这里，我们研究了摊余的贝叶斯推断的对抗性稳健性，重点关注多维后验分布的基于模拟的估计。我们展示了几个基准任务和一个来自医学成像的真实世界例子，表明几乎无法识别的有针对性的观察扰动会导致预测后验的巨大变化和高度不现实的后验预测样本。我们的结果表明，摊余的贝叶斯推断可能容易受到对抗性扰动的攻击，我们提出了一个简单的正则化方法，可以显著提高稳健性。
tldr: 本文研究了摊余的贝叶斯推断的对抗性稳健性，发现几乎不可识别的有针对性的观察扰动会导致后验预测巨大变化和不现实的后验预测样本，提出了一个简单的正则化方法来提高其稳健性。
en_tdlr: This paper studies the adversarial robustness of amortized Bayesian inference, discovering that nearly unrecognizable, targeted perturbations of observations can lead to drastic changes in posterior predictive samples. A simple regularization method is proposed to improve its robustness.
